channel.title: Color Codes/Wheel?
channel.description:
Ok, Im working on customs for 373(Recoloring.. And Dont FLAME Cause Im NEW To Customs!), Anyways i was wondering if there was a COLOR WHEEL or something like that.
P.S.- Dont flame, im new to items, im slowly moving up, but with servers ima beast. So back off P.S.S.- Non-Flamers/Helpers Thanks :D

item.title: Color Codes/Wheel?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

colors 0-49 are textures + the rest of the 65536 colors, so NO.
You can convert 24bit RGB to 16bit HSV and vice versa, sure someone wrote one.

Read full topic
